descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Zombie Malibu Sunshine is an adrenaline-fueled survival game set on a stunning yet deadly beach overrun by waves of relentless zombies. Armed with an arsenal of weapons ranging from pistols to automatic rifles, heavy machine guns, and devastating rocket launchers, you’ll fight to survive the ultimate zombie apocalypse. 
Master tactical defense strategies and fend off hordes of undead in this thrilling combination of tower defense games and action-packed shooting.

Gameplay Highlights
Massive Arsenal tesdgrinas: Start with a simple pistol and upgrade your gear as you progress. Equip shotguns for close-range carnage, unleash heavy firepower with machine guns, or wreak havoc with rocket launchers. Every weapon is designed for maximum zombie destruction.
Deadly Power-Ups: Collect powerful bonuses scattered across the battlefield to turn the tide of the invasion. Use explosive bombs that rain from the sky, fire and ice bullets to burn or freeze enemies, and bouncing zombie-killing balls to eliminate entire waves with style.
Challenging Boss Fights: Face off against massive zombie bosses with unique abilities. Strategize and adapt your tactics to bring them down and secure the beach.
Trustworthy Allies: Recruit loyal companions to join the fight.
